GSD.product_version: versions from v4.6 to before v4.19.249
GSD.description:
tty: goldfish: Fix free_irq() on remove

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.249 by commit c83a1d40dc624070a203eb383ef9fb60eb634136, it was introduced in version v4.6 by commit 465893e18878e119d8d0255439fad8debbd646fd. For more details please see the references link.
